text: “Ila wone mndonjele, ‘Twangitumbila kwa Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hetwe.’ Mvizele kota ndo yuyo Nguluwi yawele Hesekiya nakahawifya honhu hake ha kufugamila milungu na honhu hake ha kufunyizila ubani na kuwalonjela wanhu wa Yuda na wanhu wa Yelusalemu wafugame hali honhu ha kulavila nhambiko hawele ako Yelusalemu.
